plot outline: Seetha is a maternal figure to her younger sister, Swathy, and endures all difficulties laid down by Rajeshwari to protect her sister from sorrow. Seetha and Rajeswary who is a millionaire became enemies at their first meeting itself and that day onward Rajeswary's aims to defeat and destroy Seetha.
title: Seetha Kalyanam
plot: Seetha is a maternal figure to her younger sister, Swathy, and endures all difficulties laid down by Rajeshwari to protect her sister from sorrow. Seetha and Rajeswary who is a millionaire became enemies at their first meeting itself and that day onward Rajeswary's aims to defeat and destroy Seetha.
